topic.title: IDEA : add many laungage for sites in ZeroNet ()
topic.body:
what we should do to add many laungage for sites in ZeroNet ?

the must good  point in ZeroNet is "Clone site by one Click!"


and the process of develop , and add new code in a site by developer >>> other Cloner can't get last update in site >>>


so , can we develop site and the " TEXT of language should put in JSON file "
that will help an other one to make his language (EN,FR,RU,AR,IN,AN...) site and , new code to his Clone site file and support many people not programer to translate .

22_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body:
do you whant link as this :

127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit

1_18Sh2Z83C23xdd6pjCq6NGv7Y6svEBcUfb.body:
##for developer :

- extract language from page ( HTML File ) and put in external JSON file , to help any one translate file to any language (EN,FR,IT,RU,AR,IN,CH ... )

1_125b8FxS36xSSCHkvZEhimvF5KPxjckS7o.body: there are some one write (timely) about Jewish !?!

4_1BFTNXtYQDMCurqyg45KLmsV6oJD7bQSsH.body:
this is good idea , but :

1- we escape from normal internet site "http" to freedom network that allow any one to talk without "goverment" or "bad company"

2- if you have this system , then there are not deffirent between (internet network) and (zero network)

3- yes , we want mechinasme to block spamer or bad user butt no in public 


last think , in the decenter network we should have :
*privacy    
*anun(hidden)
*cryptography connection
*accessable (any time , any place)   
*no track
